title: Crashing Issue on LOL
body: I just installed L.O.L today and I've been experiencing a weird crashing issue. Whenever I try to launch the game, it says "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" and it forces me to close the program. Anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: The kernel error usually results from a security setting with your OS that's preventing the patcher from loading.  Our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should fix this up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
